div.p:
The x day of Aprile yer' et cetera lxxxiij It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assise that William
Kyntor and alexander trail aw topay thar wattir malis clamyt be the aldirman and balye
is of this last yer' bygane for freing of the toune that is tosay the said William xlvj
s' viij d' and the said alexander xxij s' iij d'

the samyn day It is appoyntit and accordit betuix William of Kyntor and John' morison for the
outred of xlvj s' viij d' acht of the said Williamis wattir mail of this last yer' bygane that
is tosay the said John' bindis and oblis' him for the said William til worschipful men James lesly
and Dauid menyes burgez of abirdene in twa hambre barellis of salmond that is tosay til
ilkane of thaim in a hambre barel of salmond Tobe payt to the saidis James and Dauid and til
ilkane of thaim thare ayris executouris or assignais at mydsummir next tocum or within xv dais
thareftir becaus' thai haf payt the said watir mail for the said William to the toune / falyeand that
the said William contentis and pais thaim nocht the said some' of xlvj s' viij d' within the said tym / And gif
the said Wilyam of Kyntor freis nocht the said John' morison of the said twa hamburgh barellis of sal
mond or the price tharof that thai ar sald for in the tym Than the said William byndis his half
net of the wattir of Done to the said Johne his ayris executouris and assignais for siclike mail
and als' gude chape as ony vthir half net of Done is set / for the yeris fisching nixt tocum
And the said Wilyam oblis' him his ayris executouris and assignais tofree the said Johne his ayris
executouris and assignais of the Witsonday mail next tocum acht of the said watir to the toune
And the said Johne morison' is becumin ful dettour be the faith of his body for the pay
ment of the saidis twa hamburgh barellis of salmond to the saidis James and Dauid in maner and fourm
before expremyt / And gif the said Johne pais the saidis twa hamburgh barrelis of salmond . for the said
Wilyam thai salbe allowit til him in his watir mail of the yeris fisching next tocum / Witnez
heirof Alexander Irvin of lummey Robert blindsel aldirman Johne Wormot Johne the Vaus
balye Duncan smyth and vthir diuers'

The samen dai Johne the Waus eldar comperit before the aldirman and diuers' of the consel of abirdene
and ratifijt and approvit the assedacion made be him to Johne of culan of his half nettis
fisching of the mydchingil indurand the termes of four' yeris fullely tobe complete and runnyn
eftir the tenour and fourm of the assedacion made to the said Johne of culan tharupon / manifestand and
declarand that he had made na condicion nor assedacion of the fisching forsaid of before til
ony vthiris before thir witnes Robert blindsel aldirman James lesly Dauid menyes alexander rede
William blindsel Wilyam moyses and ser robert leis notar with vthir sundry

In the balye court of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe the xj dai of aprile yer' forsaid / It was
ordanit be ane assise that alexander andirson sal bring the samyn blak money that henry owrum gef
him and swere the gret aith that he nevyr disponyt penny of the said blak money bot is hail and complete
as the said henry deliuerit it til him / that beand done the said henry sal pay him xiiij s' the quhilk
todo the balyeis has assignit til the said alexander this dai xv dais / The quhilk dai assignit the
said alexander in the tolbuthe brocht the said blak money before thomas fife balye and deponit be his aith as forsaid is

Johannes stewart per confessionem propriam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione sponse Dauid
menyes and emendare eedem ad visum proborum virorum

It is ordanit be the aldirman and consel for the offens done be Johne stewart til the spous' of Dauid
menyes the said Johne beand oblist his hand wphaldin tovndirly thare ordinance / that the forsaid
Johne stewart for amendis of the said strublance and offence sal pay til James coming balye twa
merkis tobe deliuerit til Sanct nicholace wark but delay And gif in tym tocum it be fundin that
he mak sic strublance and offens til hir or ony vthir famous' man or woman of this toune
he sal pay ten li' at the wil of the aldirman and consel tobe rasit and gevin to Saint nicholace wark

The xix dai of aprile yer' et cetera lxxxiij comperit in the tolbuthe before the aldirman and ballies Adam
of craufurd and askit marrowschip til him of half a net of the furdis quhilk he has in asse
dacione of the toune the quhilk demj net he sayd he had present yistirday to bath the cavillis that
remanys thare yit and couth get na marrowschip protestand that it turn him til na preiudice
anent his part of the fisch beand flayn apon that watir bot that thai cum til his behufe be
sekand the aldirman and ballies of remede heirof the quhilk demj net he present as said is before
thir witnes of the ta cavil henry rede Robert of abirdour Stevin of Kynkorth / and of the tothir ca
vyl Johne chepman eldar John chepman yongar Wil of tulidef and androw ancroft / with vthir sindry
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxjo die aprilis anno predicto

The quhilk dai before the ballies in Jugement Ranald talyour' entirit and present Johne of narne
alexander fynlaw and Rob fleschar' for the quhilkis he becom borch til androw murray eldar for xix
li' x s' til gude compt and rekning in presence of the party tofre him of the said borowgang / protes
tand that he be na forthlear' puruayt be the party vnto the tyme the principale dettouris
be fundin vnstrenyeabil for the said some' or ony part tharof sen he had present thaim for his dis
charge and done that a borch acht todo as he allegit /

Item Androw murray protestit that Ranald talyour suld be responsale and mak payment til him for the said
borowgang / quhare it falyeit that the saidis principale dettouris war vnstrenyeable

the ballies for waiknes of the court has continuit the ward and decision' of the action betuix androw
murray on the ta part anent the folowing of the some' that Ranald talyour becom borch for / againnis
the iij flescharis before expremyt on the tothir part with thar' forspekaris quhil this day viij dais

Eodem die Willelmus portar super quem alexander goldsmyth ex parte Willelmi goldsmyth filii suj extendit plegium
de iniusta detencione duarum marcarum et dimidij sepe vocatus ad comparendum responsurus dicto plegio tanquam quarto et
peremptorio die huius processus / non comparuit vnde idem alexander prosequens in causa extendit plegium quod causa non defensa
peruenit ad clameum suum nomine filius suj antedicti de huiusmodi summa contra et aduersus prefatum Willelmum Judicium cuius
ballivi posuerunt in dilacione vsque proximam curiam legalem ut dictus alexander producat procuratorium filij suj in causa

The assise ordanit Androw lammynton' topay Johne layng xxv s' vj d' that is tosay the
inglis grot / for ij s' eftir the act of parliament of the xlvij s' vj d' clamyt be the said Johne
within terme of law / and the said androw is quyte of the lave of the said some throu his pur
gacion made be his bodely aith at the ordinance of the samyn assise

The xxiiij dai of Aprile yer' et cetera lxxxiij The aldirman ballies and consel has assignit til William
portar monondai next tocum tilbring with him quhat richtis he has to the occupacion of
ane achtand part of the fisching of the Crois othir be him self or on the behalf of Ro
bert Kintor / And in the meyntyme he is chargit todesist fra the occupacion of the
samyn wattir quhil his rycht be knawin and decidit
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviij die aprilis anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiij

The quhilk dai Johne stewart be way of complaynt complenyit that a barel of vynnakir of
his quhilk he layd in thom symsonis schip was drawin in the said schip and wawntis a
gret quantite tharof / and askit remede of law tharof / the quhilk vynnakir and wawnt of the
said barrel / fynlaw fores grauntit and com dettour' tocontent the said Johne stewart
tharof within terme of law in samekil as wauntis of the said barel be the said fyndlaw or
his falouschip in sa fer as thai mak gude faith

the samyn dai Johne sincler' was chargit be thomas fife balye be his awn' graunt tocontent
to Johne litstar of the grene ix fyrlottis of meil within terme of law as he that com souerty
tharefor to the said Johne litstar

Item the samen dai the wif of William rate grantit hir tofre and releve Johne sincler' of
the said ix firlotis of meil / and askit the terme of law tobring the principale dettour throu
the quhilk scho mycht be fred / and the ballie assignit til hir this day xv dais

The samen dai maistir Johne badenach factour in that part til a worschipful knycht Sir Wilyam
of Knollis commandour of Torfichin grantit him til haf resauyt be the handis of thom symson
fyve pund gret of vsual money of flandris in part of payment of a gretar some' acht be
him to the said commandour / of the quhilk some' the said maistir Johne grantis him fullely content
and pait eftir the tenour and fourm of his quittance made tharupon writin with his awn' hand and produ
cit in Jugement et cetera

Item the samyn dai the aldirman ballies and consel has ordanit and deliuerit towarn In and charge
Ranald talyour and the thre flescharis that he com borch for at the instance of Androw murray
to this nixt friday / and than tovndirly ane assise anent the some' clamyt be the said
androw

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be Johne the vaus ane of the balyeis the second day of maij
yer' forsaid / the said balye for waiknes of the court . has delayit the action movit be Androw
murray againnis Ranald talyour as borch til him for thre flescharis / and betuix the said Ranald and
the iij flescharis to free him of the said borowgang / in sic fourm and effect as it is in this day quhil
Wednisday the vij dai of this instant moneth / agane the quhilk dai the balye has char
git philp of Dunbrek seriand towarn the said Ranald to the instance of androw murray and the
thre flescharis to free the said Ranald

The v day of maij yer' et cetera lxxxiij It is ordanit decretit and deliuerit be the aldirman and counsale
for the sustentacion and augmentacion of divine seruice tobe made in the pariskirk / that Richard boyl
salhaf and bruke the sang scule of Abirdene as principale maistir of the samyn with help and
supple of his ald maistir ser Androw thomson' and tolabour' and do thare besy diligence and cure
tomak and furnys' barnys and childir vndir thaim tostuf the qveyr and mak service tharin conti
nualy and daly Indurand the termes of nyne yeris and forthir indurand the townis wil eftir
thare gude service / And at the said Richart leve nocht na sal nocht leve the said seruice
withoute leve of the aldirman and consale the quhilkis / thai ar' oblist tovndirly and kepe be the
fathez of thar bodijs

Quo die curie legalis / alexander cowy plegius Dauid cowy super quem Willelmus necolson extendit
plegium pro iniusta detencione trium petrarum lane primo die vocatus ad intrandum eundem Dauid / non comparuit quare precipitur
pro Johannem vaus ballivum philippo Dunbrek seriando capere districtum de dicto plegio et premunire eum ad intrandum
dictum Dauid ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus
Curia ballivorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vijo die maij anno et cetera lxxxiijo /

quo die
prepositus et ballivi assignaverunt Ade andree diem lune post festum Sancte trinitis immediate sequens ad ostendendum et producendum
omnia Jura sua cuiusdam orrei jacentis ad finem vici furcarum ad instanciam Dauid marr' se
clamantis habere Jus ad dictum orreum

The samyn dai the aldirman and ballies has assignit til Ranald talyour monondai next
tocum tocomper' before thaim and bring with him the thre flescharis that he com borch for til
androw murray and thare tovndirly the law as dai peremptour for the some' clamyt be the said androw

Item the samen dai the action movit betuix Dauid Kintor and adam andirson anent a croft / becaus'
the witnes war nocht present the assise has resplatit the sammyn action and the decision of
it to this next monondai and in the meyntym that the said croft ly vnoccupyit

Item in sa fer as the assise has deliuerit and ordanit gilbert vaus todeliuer certane chartiris
of the land of vmquhile Johne of strabolgy to patrik andirson lachful procuratour to the
ayr of the said Johne of strabolgy / for the quhilk deliuerence of the said charteris
the said patrik andirson has fundin Adam andirson borch to kepe the said gilbert scaithles
of al clamys in tyme tocum of the ayris of the said Johne of strabolgy and al vthiris

The ix dai of maij yer' forsaid / It is ordanit and deliuerit be the counsale than beand present for
the tym As forsamekil that Johne of Kyntor son to Dauid Kyntor comperit before the aldirman
and ballies in the tolbuthe in a fensit court til answer' til his party plenyeand on him of strub
lance done be him on the nycht before / the said Johne in lichtlying and contempning of aldirman
and balyeis as apperit passit furth of the tolbuthe nocht bydand tothoil law na do law
as nychbur' til vthir suld do / Tharfor considering the said lychtlynes and contempning / that na
man within this burgh house nor herbry the said Johne . bot gif thai warn the
aldirman and ballies / and gif it be on the nycht that he be herbryit in ony place within
the ton' that thai sal stand for his deid vnto the tyme that thai schaw him on the morn
til the officeris tilanswer' and vndirly the law for the offence done be him

The x dai of the moneth of maij forsaid / the consale has statute and ordanit for the contempcion and lychtliing
done be Johne of Kyntor son to Dauid Kintor to the aldirman and ballies like as is contenit in the
act aboue writin / that in tyme tocum the said Johne and al vthiris forbere and commit nocht sic contemp
cion and offens vndir the pane of law tobe execute with rigour' as efferis

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the ballies the xij dai of maij yer' et cetera lxxxiij
Duncan smyth grantit in Jugement to free and releve fyndlaw fores of twa li' g' concer
ning to Johne of lammynton' eftir the tenour and fourm of thom symsonis deposicion that is to
say twa li' g' outhir' tobe pait in flandris or in abirdene penny for penny crown' for
croune ane Inglis grot for j inglis grot at the wil of the said Johne of lammynton'
within xv dais

The samen dai the assise has ordanit and deliuerit / that Ranald talyour' sal pay and content til androw
murray eldar as dettour' til him for thre flescharis the some' of threttene pundis of vsu
ale money of Scotland be way of composicion within viij dais next eftir folowand the date
of this act

the samyn dai Alexander fyndlaw Johne of narn and Rob fleschar' ar bundin and oblist be the faith
of thare bodyis in Jugement tofreith and releve Ranald talyour of the said threttene li'
the quhilk the assise has ordanit him dettour for thaim til androw murray ilkane of thaim be thaim
self iiijor li' vj s' viij d' within the said viij dais for ilkane of thare awn partis / and tokepe
the said Ranald scathles and vnhurt tharof / before thir witnes Robert blindsel aldirman thomas fife
James comyn ballies adam andirson alexander trail alexander sanchar' maistir Alexander fife and ser Robert
leis notaris with vthir diuers'

Item the said dai the assise has decretit and deliuerit / that Dauid Kyntor sal occupy the croft
clamyt be adam andirson in tak of Johne of Kintor lyand at the gallougate hede for
this yer' and vnto the tyme / that the said Johne occupy the said croft his self

the same dai Johne the Waus eldar is becumin borch til pay or ger be payt til Dauid
spens' wif / for Arne some' xiij s' within xv dais

the said dai the action debatable betuix androw vaus and gilbert morison was referrit til certane
personis sworn as ane assise / quhilkis riply avisit decretit and ordanit gilbert morison to
content and pay til androw vaus forsaid four' pundis of vsual money of scotland within xv dais

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the ballies of the samyn the xiiij dai of maij
yer' et cetera lxxxiij It is deliuerit and ordanit be ane sworn assise alexander menyes forspekar
tharof / that al merchandis that had gude in thom symsonis schip of this last viage
that quhare thai had a sek furthwart suld haf layd in a tvn of dry gude
agane hamewart / and becaus' thai falyeit in the ladyn of the said schip hame
wart / thai sal gif for every tvn of waist fracht to the said thomas symsoune
skippar' viij s' of vsual money of Scotland

The xvj day of maij yer' forsaid . It is appoyntit and accordit betuix Robert blindsel aldirman
of abirdene and Dauid menyes eldar maistir of the kirk wark of the samyn burgh on the ta part / and John'
alanson' maistir of a bote of Dysart on the tothir part / that is tosay the said Johne alanson has
saulde to the kirk wark of the said burgh his said boteful of lyme alsmekle as scho may
gudely fuyr / for xvj s' the chaldir tobe brocht heir' to the key of abirdene alssune gudely as
wynd and weddir wil serue him tharto / for the quhilk lyme the said Johne alanson grantis him til
haf resauit fra the said mastir of the kirk wark xxij s' j d' in part of payment / And John' the
vaus eldar and Wilyam moyses ar' oblist to releve the said mastir of wark of xij d' of ilke chaldir
as for ten chaldir And the said Johne alanson salbe payt for the said lyme alssune as he ma
kis deliuerence of the samen but fraude or gile To the quhilkis bath the partiez ar' oblist be the faith'
of thir bodiis witnez heirof thomas fife Johne of culan Dauid menyes yongar alexander rede David symson'
gilbert Waus androw Wenton' and vthir diuers'

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the aldirman and ballies of the samyn the xxj day of
maij yer' et cetera lxxxiij It was ordanit and deliuerit be the said aldirman and ballies with consent of diuers'
of the consale / anent the actione dependand of ane annuel rent of xx s' clamyt be Johne of Kyn
tor son' and ayr' of vmquhile gilbert Kintor of the land of vmquhile Johne nachty liand in
the ovirkirkgate on the ta part / and Johne Wormot for him self his wif and the lave of hir
sistiris on the tothir part / that the said parties sal compere on mononday cum viij dais before thaim / and
bring with thaim sic euidentis and documentis as thai wil wyn and tyne withal / be the law / and to see
ane Inquisicion' be gevin to the said Johne of Kintor of the said annuel rentis as lachful' ayr' til
his fadir

The samyn day the ballies assignit til Duncan scot and Dauy atkin duelland in tulicorthy
this day viij daies tobring with thaim previs anent ane hors and j cow quhilkis thai coissyt
togiddir and anent the condicion' of the samen

henry owrum is convict be his awn' graunt for foristalling of skynnis of the quhilk he re
fusit til acquite him be his aith eftir the ordinance of the assise

Thom quhite is chargit be the ballies tilanswer' to the borch strekit on him be thom of marr'
in the next lachful court tobe haldin on mononday cum viij daies
Curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per Johannem Waus vnum ballivorum eiusdem xxij die maij anno predicto

quo die thomas Donaldi per prelocutorem suum Willelmum blindsel prosecutus fuit per plegium thomam quhite de
iniusta detencione xxiiij solidorum ad bonum compotum qui thomas quhite peciit diem legittimum ad respondendum / et ex de
creto curie ballivus assignauit eidem diem lune proximam pro die peremptorio responsurus et Juri periturus Et idem
thomas Donaldi constituit dictum Willelmum blindsel procuratorem suum in presenti causa promittens de Rato et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per Thomam fife vnum ballivorum eiusdem secundo die
Junij anno quo supra

Thomas quhite primo die vocatus ad sectam thome marr' pro iniusta detencione iiijor marcarum per suam obligacionem causa mutuj
non comparuit / quare precipitur philippo Dunbrek seriando capere districtum et cetera et pro j par' ocrearum

Mawnis galt producit for witnes be gilbert leche sworn deponit and sayd that he com on the said
gilbertis behalf to John' of Knollis and askit him xl s' in the tym of the ganging of the blak money / and that
Johne of Knollis chargit mark his child todeliuer him the said some' / and he com to marke and couth
get na payment fra him of that some' / swa passit the said mawnis to gilbert leche agane
and tauld him / that he couth get na deliuerence tharof / And tuke payment fra the said gilbert of
the xl s' on Johne currouris behalf /

Inquisitores Alexander rede alexander de marr' andreas branch Willelmus Kintor thomas de marr' David marr'
alexander sanchar' gilbertus leche Willelmus more David hil Willelmus necolson andreas atkin Symon gardin
et findelaius fores / quhilkis has fundin decretit and ordanit / that Thomas of fife balye suld pas
togif sesyne state and heritable possession til Johne of Kintor sone' and ayr' of vmquhile gil
bert of Kintor burges of this burgh of twenty s' of annuel rent of the land that Alexander
nachty duellis in liand in the ovirkirkgate as lachful ayr' til his fadir of the samyn
annuel rent / eftir the law and consuetude of burgh et cetera

The ix dai of June yer' et cetera lxxxiij Androw branche becom souerty til entir Johne stewart before
the aldirman and balyeis to thare challance to morn in the hour' of caus'
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per prepositum et ballivos eiusdem xo die Junij anno predicto /

quo die
subscripti electi fuerunt et Jurati in assisam videlicet patricius andirson andreas Wenton' Willelmus goldsmyth'
Willelmus quelp Robertus crag Johannes fichet Dauid Duncanj Willelmus andirson Johannes symsone henricus
mortymer et thomas quhite

The quhilk assise riply avisit fand and deliuerit that Johne stewart had wranguisly strublit and
hurt his wif in lichtliing and contempning of the worschip of this toune / quharfor' he was adiugit
in amerciament of the court and toforber' in tym tocum et cetera And anent his accusacion of common tulyy the
assise has referrit the determinacion tharof to the aldirman and consel eftir thare consideracion of the actis made
apon the said Johne tharupon' of before / and gif thai fynd be the law that a man beand convict
thryse or four' tymes of strublance / is a common' tulyour the assise sais the samyn et cetera

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be thomas fife and James cvmyn twa of the ballies
of the samyn the xj dai of June yer' forsaid comperit Dauid Duncan' and made protestacion that
quhat alienacion margret the Waus his spous' had made sen the tyme that thai war' in
band of matrimonye outhir' of land or gudis for fraude or fruelte suld turn him na
his ayris to na preiudice in tym tocum / bot that he mycht haf regres of law tharto quhat
tyme he persewit it before ony Juge witnes heirof Johne chepman John' of lammyn
ton nicol liel burgez and philp of Dunbrek seriand

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xvjto die Junij anno et cetera lxxxiijo
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata

Thomas quhite secundo die vocatus ad sectam thome de marr'
pro iiijor marcas et j par' ocrearum / non comparuit / Ideo precipitur philippo Dunbrek seriando capere districtum
de dicto thoma quhite et cetera et premunire eundem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem processus

Eodem die decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per os Willelmi modan iudicatoris curie
quod plegium porrectum per Alexandrum trail asseren' quod processus prosecuti per alexandrum goldsmyth ex parte
Willelmi goldsmyth filij suj aduersus Willelmum portar plegium dicti alexandri trail de iniusta detencione duarum
marcarum et dimidij non fuerunt iuridice ducti pro eo quod idem alexander goldsmyth non produxit procuratorem
legittimum super prosecucione eiusdem cause nullius est valoris Et quod Recontrariacio eiusdem plegij
facti per dictum Willelmum goldsmyth est valida vnde / alexander trail adiudicatur in amerciamento curie
Et protestatus fuit dictus alexander trail pro Remedio Juris

Item eodem die decretum fuit et deliberatum per assisam iuratam quod Willelmus portar' tenetur sa
tisfacere Willelmo goldsmyth xxxiij s' iiij d' vnde adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento idem Willelmus
portar pro iniusta detencione dicte summe et ad satisfaciendum eandem infra terminum Juris Et dictus Willelmus
goldsmyth constituit alexandrum goldsmyth patrem suum et magistrum Johannem badenach procuratores suos coniunctim et divisim ad pe
tendum et recipiendum dictam summam a Willelmo portar / et ad prosequendum legittime actionem suam aduersus thomam
de marr' penes v li' g' et quoscumque alios necnon ad defendendum et prosequendum Jus suum de illa terra quam
emit dictus constituens a Reddendo patre domino Andrea electo confirmato morauiensis / ac in omnibus aliis suis
negociis causis et querelis ipsum Willelmum tangentibus quomodolibet in futurum Et promisit de Rato
Judicio sisti Judicat' soluj in latissima forma procuratorie/ testibus thoma symson prelocutore dicte assise David
Duncani Johanne lambynton' et curia
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per prepositum et ballivos eiusdem xixno die Junij anno et cetera lxxxiijo

quo die subscripti accusati de foristallacione huius burgi et priuilegij eiusdem et abductione
lane pellium et bidencium ouium extra vicecomitatum de abirdene posuerunt se in voluntate prepositi et ballivorum de dicta
calumpnia videlicet Walterus alexanderson pro foristallacione ouium Robertus Johneson' pro ouibus similiter thomas
blak pro foristallacione lane thomas de hawdach pro ouibus et thomas Watson pro foristallacione lane et pellium et cetera

Eodem die post merediem coram preposito in pretorio Jacobus lesly inuenit Willelmum portar' plegium legalem
pro eo quod Johannes Wormot erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictus Johannes dedit Ste
phanum giffard plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate eiusdem Jacobi aliter quam per viam Juris

The xx day of June yer' forsaid comperit in the tolbuthe Johne andirson duelland in the
schipraw before Robert blindsel aldirman and protestit opinly that the sit sesyne and possession
that alexander trail has gevin of the land that meg the vaus duellis in liand in the schip
raw pertening to the said Johne / til ser Dauid the vaus curate of abirdene or to the said
margret the vaus suld tvrn the said Johne andirson nor his ayris and assignais to
na preiudice in tyme tocum anent thare richt of the sammyn land within the pertinentis before
thir witnes Dauid mathoson' alexander marr' Dauid hil Wil modan' androw ettal philp
of Dunbrek and morice besat seriandis with vthir diuers'

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be the aldirman and Johne the vaus ane of the ballies of this
burgh the xxj dai of the moneth of June forsaid SAndy lambynton' was convict be ane assise for
the wrangwis' intrometting with a cow pertening til the parson of owyn' and for the foristalling made be
the said Sandy lammynton' anent the bying of the said cow eftir that the parson of owyn had bocht hir
and for the wrang he was in amerciament et cetera and androw lammynton' avowit the said sandy in his deid
the quhilk he vndirstude was lachful'
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxiij die Junij anno et cetera lxxiijo

patricius chavmer inuenit Johannem vaus
seniorem plegium legalem pro eo quod alexander skynnar' erit indempnes aliter quam per viam Juris Et Jacobus carg deuenit
plegium pro dicto alexandro de indempnitate eiusdem patricij ut supra

In the ballie court of the burgh of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe the xxv dai of June the
yere forsaid comperit before the aldirman and John' the vaus balye in Jugement Dauid mar and
askit payment fra Alexander trail of xj merkis acht til him be his obligacion than beand present
quhilk obligacion made mencion that the said alexander band his croftis quhilkis he has in
assedacion of Wilyam cryne til the said Dauid gif it happinnit him tofalye in payment
of the said some' at the termes contenit in the sammyn obligacion the said alexander sayand that the
said Dauid mycht haf na mare bote his band of his obligacion fulfillit eftir the tenor of
the sammyn / And the said alexander is chargit tocompere on friday til answer' til his obligacion'
gif he accordis nocht with the said Dauid tharupon in the meyn tyme

The same dai It was ordanit be ane assise that gif Johne of Knollis wif and ser Johne of
strathachin wil swere the gret aith that mark left hir xl s' to gif to gilbert leche and bad
hir ga to gilbert leche and pay him / and that scho passit to the said gilbertis hous' before
the crying downe of the blak money and offerit payment of the said some' / this beand
done the said Johne of Knollis and mark his child ar fre of the said some' and falyeand
that thai swere nocht the said aith the said John' of Knollis or mark his child sal pay the
said some' to gilbert leche within terme of law / The quhilk aith John' of Knollis wif
and the said ser Johne has sworn incontinent in presence of the said gilbert eftir the fourm of the deliuerence
of the assise / and swa John of Knollis and mark his child ar quyte of the said gilbertis clame of
the some' forsaid

The xxvij dai of June yer' et cetera lxxxiij / It was rehersit be Dauid menyes mastir of the kirk
wark / that it was appoyntit decretit and ordanit in lentrin last bypast the tym of the aldirmanis
being in edinburgh at the parliament / betuix the masownys of the luge that is tosay Richard ancram
androw murray James of barry Johne russal Johne of Kyndrumy and matho wrycht / eftir that thai war
frendit and accordit apon certane debate and controuersy betuix thaim / that gif ony tym tocum thareftir / ony of thaim
offendit til vthir that war fundin in a faute/ for the first faute he suld gif xx s' to Saint nicho
lace wark vnforgevin / and for the second faute gif thai fautyt agane xl s' And gif thai
fautit the thrid tym tobe excludit oute of the luge as a common forfautour The quhilk ordinance
the masownis forsaidis has ratifiit and approvit this samyn day before the aldirman and consel and
newlingis oblist thame til obserue the samyn be the faith of thare bodijs

the samyn dai Robert blindsel aldirman and the persons of consel vndirwritin that is tosay Alexander
chavmer alexander menyes James lesly Dauid symson alexander rede Dauid menyes alexander howisone
alexander marr' gilbert vaus Johne the vaus eldar Johne Wormot androw branch William blindsel
Dauid marr' thom of marr' William hay androw murray eldar adam crafurd alexander scrogis and gilbert
leche / At the request and instance of my lord of huntly and the lard of Innes has grauntit to
Thomas rolland son and ayr to vmquhile William rolland / becaus' he had na tak of
the wattiris / that he salhaf the next vacand of wattiris of the said burgh that happinnis
tovaik of resoune / and falyeand tharof / that he salhaf half a net / of the mydchingil at
the next assedacione tobe made be the commission of the toune wpon the quhilk thai
haf grauntit the common Seil

Item the samen dai becaus' the aldirman and consel fand and considerit certane controuersy betuix Richard
ancram and androw murray masownys of the quhilk the pain aboue writtin is remittyt thaim
at this tym / the aldirman and consel forsaid has ordanit that gif in tym cuming thare be fundin
ony strublance or offence commitit betuix thaim / that he that beis fundin in the faute
tharof salbe expellit the luge fra that tyme furth et cetera

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the aldirman and Johne the vaus ane of the ballies
the xxviij dai of June yer' et cetera lxxxiij / William portar was accusit for strublance of William quelp
in the wrangwis' taking of fisch pertening to the said Wilyam quelp be reson' of assedacion made
til him be the toune of ane auchtand part of the crois / and the said Wilyam askit ane day tobe
avisit tomak answer' and the court assignit til him with his awn consent friday the ferd day
of Julij next tocum / borch for his intra that dai alexander rede til answer' til ony party complenyand
of strublance And becaus' Wilyam portar sayd that he wald intromet with the said fisch . bot gif thai
war tane fra him be sum man in name of the toun and nocht be na parcial party / the aldirman with consent
of diuers' of the consel than present has ordanit Johne the vaus balye til intromet with the said fisch
ing in name of the toune quhil the said friday / and than tobe furthcumand til ony party havand
maist rycht tharto / to the quhilk friday Wilyam portar is chargit tocum todo law and tak law
anent his clame of the samyn fisching

The ferd dai of Julij yer' forsaid Thomas of fife ane of the ballies chargit Duncan smyth in the
kingis name to remayn in the tolbuthe vnto the tyme he content and pait til Johne of lammynton'
twa li' g' eftir the fourm of thom symsonis deposicion / as he that was oblist to the said balye be the
faith of his body for the payment of the sammyn sowme

The ix dai of July yer' et cetera lxxxiij Johne the vaus ane of the ballies of abirdene at the command'
of the aldirman passit til Dauid symson' and alexander howison' at the instance of maistir James
strathachin factour to my lady of huntle / and arrestit the tende fisch of Done belang
ing the chanslery tobe furthcumand to the chalance of my lady of huntly charge
and the forsaidis Dauid and alexander that thai suld nocht analy nor dispone apon' the forsaid
fisch vnto the tyme that it war decidit be the law quha had rycht to thaim vndir
the pane of law / before thir witnes William quelp Dauid strathachin alexander alanson'
patrik hil and vthir diuers'

The samen dai in the fensit court haldin be the said balye / Alexander trail summond and chargit
be Duncan straloch seriand tocompere this day in the ballie court at the instance of Dauid
marr' for the wrangwis' halding of xj merkis acht til the said Dauid be his obligacion
til answer' and vndirly the law / and als' to the chalance of the aldirman and ballies oft tymes
callit comperit nocht quharfor the said Dauid opinly protestit / that sen the said alexander trail
quhilk was warnit to this court and diuers' vthiris of before til answer' til his obligacione
wald nocht compere tharto / that he may at the leist had the pane and band of the said obliga
cione fulfillit eftir the tenour of the samyn in faute of payment / and that he mycht haf recurs'
tharto / at his awn wil

The xij dai of July yer' et cetera lxxxiij It is ordanit be the Aldirman and consel of abirdene for the wphal
ding of divine service becaus' Richart boyl has left the service of the parroche kirk of the
said burgh withoute leve of the aldirman and consel / that Androw ettal ane of the clerkis salhaf
the quartar of the gallowgate that the said Richart had with the samyn profitis and dewi
teis pertening tharto / til his fee for this instant yere / and forthir' tobe continewit at the
townis wil / the said Androw makand diligent and gude seruice tharefor at this gudely
power' in the parroche kirk and qvere of the said burgh and al vthir service acht and wount

The samyn dai the aldirman and consel forsaidis has gevin and grauntit til Androw cowpar the
quhilk thai haf ordanit ferd parroche clerk / the gaistraw and the scule hil that Androu
ettal had with al profitis and dewiteis pertening tharto / for his fee for this instant yer' and forthir'
at the townis wil for his gude ministracion and service tobe done tharfor in the parroche
kirk and qveyr of the burgh forsaid and al vthir seruice acht and wownt /

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xiiijto die mensis Julij
Anno Dominj et cerea lxxxiijo

the quhilk dai the aldirman and consel decretit ordanit and deliuerit / that the ballies of this burgh
or ony of thaim sal pas and mak penny of Alexander tralis gudis for xj merkis acht be him til
Dauid marr' be his obligacion of termys bigane and mak the said Dauid be content and
payt of the said some' within xv dais / And gif his gudis extendis nocht to the vail of the
said some' / that thai mak penny of his croftis / quhilkis ar bundin til the said Dauid in
his obligacion quhil he be fullely assithit and payt of the hail some' of ellevin merkis
within the said terme of law

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be Johne the vaus balye the xv dai of the moneth of Julij
forsaid Richart of bernys was adiugit in amerciament of the court for the wrangwis' halding
of a rynche gudlyn fra Robert ewynson and til content him tharof within terme of law

The xix dai of Julij yer' et cetera lxxxiij Alexander rede grantit him awand til a worschipful
knycht William of Knollis commandour of Torfichin four' barrellis of Salmond quhilkis
he ressavit fra Wilyam blindsel in the name and on the behalf of the said ser William
of Knollis / for the quhilk the aldirman chargit and gerd ane seriand lay wand on him
that he suld nocht pas oute of the tolbuthe quhil he content the said knicht

The samyn dai Alexander sanchar' grantit him awand til the said ser Wilyam of Knollis
ane barrel of Salmond the quhilk he was chargit topay in like wise

Item Edmond the hay was chargit be his awn' grawnt til pay demj barel of
Salmond til the forsaid knicht acht be him and tocontent him tharof or he passit oute of the tolbuth'

The samyn dai at the instance of the said ser Wilyam of Knollis commandour of Torfichin
the aldirman and ballies chargit Duncan straloch seriand til arrest viij barrellis
of Salmond in the handis of Alexander howison' quhilk has in assedacion the wattir
pertening til malcum mowat / tobe furthcumand to the chalance of the said knycht for
iij li' g' and x s' g' acht be the said malcum as first optenit det apon the samyn malcum
be the said knycht / The quhilk arrest the seriand made before thir witnez Alexander
rede William blindsel alexander sanchar' ser John' striuelin notar and vthiris diuers'

xxjo die mensis Julij supradicto Johannes Waus ballivus asseruit quod Johannes ruthirfurd miles inuenit Willelmum
blindsel plegium legalem quod Alexander chavmer de murchil et pars sua erunt indempnes de ipso et parte sua aliter quam
per viam Juris / Et quod Andreas Wenton deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto Alexandro quod dictus miles et pars sua
erunt indempnes de ipso alexandro et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiijo die Julij anno et cetera lxxxiijo

The quhilk dai thom of marr' has grauntit in Jugement tocontent and pay to Wilyam gold
smyth twa li' g' in abirdene in gold and siluer siclike price as it gais in flandris within xv dais
next tocum / and tokeip the aldirman scathles of the said some' as he that becom borch for the pay
ment of the samyn

The same dai Johne Wormot fermorar' to peter Kymdy of the odhalf net of the Raik
grauntis him topay and content to the priour' and conuent of the blak freris four' merkis viij s' of
termis bigane gif thai haf resone tharto at mertymes in wyntir next tocum or at the ferrest
ar he streik the said half net but langar' dilay

Item the said dai Duncan Kyd clamyt Androw gaw of a hors . the quhilk hors the said androw be
his forspekar lindesay harrald avowit til a warrant / and askit ane lachful day to
bring his warrand / and the balye Johne the vaus assignit til him this dai xv dais
borch gilbert of chavmer for the entra of the hors the said dai in like ply as he was
prisit the tym that he was arrestit

Wilyam the hay grauntit him awand to ser William Knollis commandour of Torfichin twa
barellis of salmond acht of termys bigane

The actione movit be Androw andirson aganis alexander rede androw murra and vthiris certane merchandis anent scot the
lot of certane gudis tane fra the said androw be holandaris oute of a kervel cumand til abirdene
is continuit be the aldirman and consel becaus' of waiknes of the court to friday next tocum

The xxvj dai of July yer' forsaid Robert blindsel aldirman grauntis him tilhaf tane and res
sauit fra Alexander chavmer seriand fifty and fyve schillingis for the half of the Rude malis
of abirdene of this instant yer' of god et cetera lxxxiij / of the quhilk some' he haldis him weil
content and pait / And quytclemis the said alexander his ayris executouris and assignais tharof for evyr

The samyn dai Alexander menyes Dauid menyes Johne colison Alexander marr' James cvmyn Da
uid symson William blindsel Dauid marr' androw murray eldar alexander nachty Wilyam moyses
mawnis Wormot adam andirson gilbert leche and Wilyam futhes grantit for thaim the Secret
seil of this burgh til Robert blindsel aldirman Wpon the actis made til him of before anent
the payment tobe made til him of the propine costis and expens' made be him and his complicis
for the owyrgetting of the custum of Salmond and for our soueran lordis chartir and lettres
made tharupon' And anent the releving of the said aldirman of lx li' or of certane Sal
mond extendand to the said some for the quhilkis he is bundin be his lettres obligatouris
for his expens' made anent the labouring and impetracion of the said chartir be our souerane
lord graciously grantit / as the forsaidis actis mare fullely proportis

Primo die Augusti anno et cetera lxxxiijo prepositus ballivi consules and communitas dederunt et assignarunt domino Johanni
striuelin capellano / capellaniam altaris beati Johannis ewangeliste vacans per resignacione domini Johannis Kyd pro tempore vite sue
secundum formam et tenorem litterarum / sub Sigillo communi huius burgi sibi desuper confectum et cetera

iiijto die Augusti anno predicto in curia ballivorum decretum fuit per assisam quod Robertus Walkar' satisfactionem te
netur alexandro prat pro firma cuiusdam domus iiij s' infra terminum Juris et est in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione eiusdem summe

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per balliuos eiusdem quinto die mensis Augusti anno
Dominj et cetera lxxxiijo

The quhilk day before the aldirman and ballies in Jugement Johne of glenmaluin grantit him tohaf
ressauit fra Dauid prat oute of Joffray blumys schip ane petty quartar of salt of
the quhilk petty quartar he is oblist tokeip the said Dauid scaithles of Dauid gethanis
clame and his wifis and of al vthiris clame in tyme tocum

The samyn day Dauid gethanis wif with hir forspekar alexander rede chalansit Dauid prat
and Johne of glenmaluin of the wrangwuis' intrometting and halding of the said petty quartar of salt / the
quhilkis denyand the wrang the said action was put til ane sworn assise quhilk riply
avisit fand and deliuerit that Johne of glenmaluin had rycht and reson' to the said petty quartar of salt
and that thai war quyte of the said clame et cetera

Item the said day comperit in the tolbuthe before Johne the vaus ane of the ballies Androw andirson
with his forspekar Dauid menyes yongar and Rehersit how the action movit be the said androw
on the ta part / againis alexander rede androw murray eldar Johne of glenmaluin and vthiris certane mer
chandis thare complicis on the tothir part / anent scot the lot of certane gudis tane fra the said androw
andirson be holandaris oute of James cantis kervel cumand til abirdene was summittit
til vij certane personis chosin / with consent of the saidis partiez and ordanit tilhaf comperit in the
tolbuthe be twa houris eftir none for the determinacion of the samyn / and nochtwithstanding
the houre limmit beand passit and the said androw redy for his part at the samen houre and
ane hour' thareftir / his party contrar comperit nocht as than nor the personis chosin for the determinacion
of the said caus' debatabil / wpon the quhilkis the said androw andirson askit record of
the balye forsaid

The samyn dai betuix iij and iiij houris eftir none the action debatable betuix Androw andirson
on the ta part / againis alexander rede androw murray eldar Johne of glenmaluin and vthiris certane
merchandis thare complicis on the tothir part / anent scot the lot of certane gudis tane fra the said
androw andirson be holandaris oute of James cantis kervel cumand til abirdene / was put
til Alexander chavmer of murchil Dauid symson adam of crafurd gilbert leche and thom
ramsay of leith chosin with consent of the samyn parties and sworn as in ane assise to
determyn the said debate eftir thar consciens and knaulage and eftir as thai couthe get
witting . The quhilkis personis eftir the avaymentis and allegiance of the partiez before
thame proponit has continuit this action with consent of partiez / quhil tomorn at x houris
for mare informacion tobe had in this matir / and thom ramsay has declarit his mynd in
this caus' to the lave of the persons chosin tharupon in cais' it happin him to sayl et cetera

ixno die mensis Augusti anno Domini et cetera lxxxiijo prepositus et Johannes vaus vnus ballivorum burgi ceperunt
thomam rolland plegium legalem pro Willelmo portar quod thomas de marr' et Andreas rede de bad
fothellis et eorum pars erunt indempnes de dicto Willelmo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Et ijdem thomas de marr' et andreas rede inuenerunt dictis preposito et ballivo Dauid marr' plegium legalem
quod Willelmus portar et pars sua erunt indempnes de ipsis et partibus suis aliter quam per viam Juris

The xij dai of august yer' forsaid in presence of the aldirman and diuers' of the consel alexander hay askit Johne
the vaus tored til him a tavern of the foreland quhilk he has bocht fra patrik forbes the quhilk
tavern the said Johne avowit til a warrand of the said patrik denyand tored it til him / quhar
for the said alexander has taxit ij s' apon the said Johne for ilke oulk dai that he occupijs the said tavern
fra thine furth

the xiiij dai of the moneth of august forsaid / In the court haldin be Johne the vaus ane of
the ballies of this burgh It was decretit and deliuerit be ane sworn assise / Adam of crafurd for
spekar / that Dauid spens is fundin dettour' til Donald strathachin and Wil of garuiach topay and
deliuer to thaim four' barrellis of tar / And gif it be fundin that thai wawnt the saidis iiij barrelis
of tar in the said Dauyis defaute / he sal mak his awne costis for the feching of thame
And gif it be in thar defautis . thai sal mak the said Dauyis costis
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xvj die augusti anno predicto /

quo die alexander prat conuictus per
assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione alexandri findlaw et tenetur emendare eidem et cetera
Willelmus famulus andree lowson in amerciamento quia perturbavit iniuste alexandrum prat

Thomas de narn amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione Andree lammynton et famuli eiusdem andree
prout compertum' fuit per assisam et tenetur emendare eisdem ad visum proborum virorum

The xix dai of August yer' et cetera lxxxiij before the ballies in a fensit court Alexander trail
opinly protestit that quhat actis ar made wranguisly or vnordourly apon him at the instance
of Dauid marr' suld nocht hurt the said alexander na turn him to na preiudice in tym tocum

Item the said balyeis and specialy thom of fife chargit and warnit the said alexander trail with
his awn consent til comper' before the aldirman and consel on fridai next tocum the xxij dai of
this instant moneth gif he had tosay again the act deliuerit be the said aldirman and consel til op
pone than agane it as law wil / And eftir the tenour of that samen act / Dauid marr'
askit iustice at the ballies and toput it in execucion that he mycht be payt of xj merkis
acht til him be alexander trail eftir the decret and ordinance of the aldirman and consel forsaid

Eodem die alexander trail conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta lesione et perturbacione Johannis Wrycht
et emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxo die Augusti anno et cetera lxxxiijo

The quhilk dai comperit before the aldirman and ballies in Jugement William portar / and
sayd that he was redy tofree his law borowis and todo law and tak law gif
ony party was complaintwis' apon him

Item the said aldirman and ballies sayd the party that the souerty was takin of / was lyand
and mycht nocht cum / and quhen the said partie mycht cum thai offerit thaim tominster iustice
to the said partijs

xxjo die mensis augusti predicti andreas kelach in amerciamento curie pro perturbio cuiusdam edwardi prout compertum fuit
per assisam / et iniungitur eidem pro emenda ad deliberandum j libre cere ad lumen beati nicholai

the xxij dai of the said moneth of august / the action betuix Dauid marr' and alexander trail of xj
merkis twiching ane obligacion made be alexander trail til the said Dauid of the samen some' / Is continu
it with consent of partijs be the aldirman and ballies quhil monondai next tocum in sic force and effect
as this dai in al thingis concerning that matir / and in the mene tym til attemp concord betuix the partijs
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxv die Augusti anno supradicto

quo die vxor alexandri sincler' in amerciamento pro perturbio seruientis Johannis smyth et tenetur emendare ad visum proborum
Item agnes smyth conuicta per assisam amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione alexandri sincler' et vxoris eiusdem alexandrum
et emendabuit eisdem ut Jura volunt

Willelmus blindsel inuenit Dauid symson plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate alexandri sincler' et vxoris sue aliter
quam per viam Juris

John' of glenmaluin in amerciament for the wranguis' strublans of Johne fichet And the said John fichet
in amerciament for the wranguis' takin of a schule fra John of glenmaluin as was fundin be assise

In curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xo die Septembris anno quo supra / Subscripti electi fuerunt in assisam
videlicet Dauid symson gilbertus vaus thomas prat Walterus achneve Johannes stewart Dauid menyes senior
Johannes stevinson andreas rettre Dauid prat Dauid roberti Robertus buchan Dauid hil Johannes malisson
Willelmus futhes Johannes glenmalvin ranaldus talyour et Walterus thome / quhilkis personis sworn has
continuit the action betuix Johne colison / and William moyn induellar' of the fere / anent ijc li'
xvj li' xij s' and vj d' of scottis money clamyt be the said John' to friday the xij day of this
instant moneth of Septembre with consent of partiis in hope of concord / And that day the said assise
or the maist part of thaim beand present sal deliuer and gif furth thare determinacion of the said matir et cetera

Wilyam blindsel grantit in Jugement before the aldirman and ballies tocontent and pay to mawnis Wor
mot quhatsumeuir some' that alexander sanchar' wil declare be his aith that the said William
is awand to the said mawnis be the poyntment that the said alexander made in the said Williamis
name betuix him and mawnis Wormot et cetera
